important_notice: ⚠️ CRITICAL: ALWAYS VERIFY CONTRACT ADDRESSES ON OFFICIAL EXPLORERS BEFORE USE
verification_required: Contract addresses change over time. Always verify on Etherscan before transactions.

chunks.title: Ethereum Token Contracts and Technical Specifications
chunks.body: ⚠️ WARNING: Always verify contract addresses on Etherscan.io before use. Ethereum token contract addresses, decimals, and technical specifications for popular tokens. These addresses require verification and may change over time.
chunks.summary_en: Authoritative Ethereum token contract addresses with decimals and technical specifications for accurate transfers.
chunks.summary_zh: 权威的以太坊代币合约地址，包含小数位数和技术规格，确保准确转账。

contracts.name: Ethereum
contracts.notes: Native Ethereum token, no contract address needed

technical_notes: ⚠️ VERIFICATION REQUIRED: Check all addresses on https://etherscan.io before use
All ERC-20 tokens follow the same interface standard
Ethereum uses hex encoding for addresses (0x prefix)
Native ETH transfers don't require a contract address
Gas fees required for all Ethereum transactions
Contract addresses may change - never use without current verification
